article_title: Cloud Computing's Second Act Is All Business

article_metadata.author: Joe McKendrick

og.description: In a recent post, Bernard Golden, one of the most respected thought leaders in the cloud space, asked the question: "Has cloud computing been a failed revolution?" He conveys the observation that Google search traffic for the term "cloud computing" peaked in 2011 and has trailed off since then. It's also [...]
